text: Charlie and the Chocolate Factory: Original Motion Picture Soundtrack is the soundtrack to Tim Burton's 2005 film of the same name. The film's music was composed by Danny Elfman who also provided vocals for the songs. ==Track listing== ==References== Category:Albums produced by Danny Elfman Category:Danny Elfman soundtracks Category:2005 soundtrack albums Category:2000s film soundtrack albums Category:Warner Records soundtracks Category:Albums recorded at Abbey Road Studios Category:Willy Wonka
title: Charlie and the Chocolate Factory (soundtrack)
